text: She transforms the sound of her bow and movement of her troops into a violent and beautiful song and dance.
A man of measured approach, but also a keen opportunist that does not let go by a chance to climb higher.
She never gave up in life - her art and her will were passed on from generation to generation.
She never gave up in life - her art and her will were passed on from generation to generation.
The beauty and qualities of Yuan Anyang, a princess of the Kingdom of Zhong, are known throughout the land.
The stakes are raised on the fringes of the empire; Hou Jintingâ€™s keen senses and vigilance safeguard the future of her family.
Blessed with prodigious foresight, Yan Xiang forsees perils and pitfalls long before they arise.

At an early age, Dong Zhuo gave Dong Bai his land to her. For some reason, her personality and reputation are not very good, but no one has been treated recklessly because of Dong Zhuo who takes care of her.

Zou Yuan, the beauty everyone coveted, was widely known for her beauty. So many heroes wanted to keep her next to them at all costs. To the extent that Cao Cao lost his son and his general during the secret meeting with her at night.
